@import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Noto+Sans+TC:wght@400;500;600;700;900&display=swap');

html,body{
	font-family:"Montserrat", 'Noto Sans TC',Verdana, Arial, "Microsoft JhengHei" !important;
	font-weight:400 !important;
}

h1,h2,h3,h4,h5,h6{
	font-family:"Montserrat", 'Noto Sans TC',Verdana, Arial, "Microsoft JhengHei" !important;
font-width:700;
}

.menu-link {
	font-size: 0.9rem !important
}

/* Structure */
.wrap{
	max-width:1200px;
	margin:0 auto;
	padding:80px 30px;
}
.page_sub_tit{
	font-weight:700;
	line-height:1.35;
	text-align:center;
	margin-bottom:2.5rem;
}
.page_sub_tit p:nth-of-type(1){

	color:#E8A33A;
	margin-bottom:0em;
}

	color:#25A19B;
}

.blk_tit h3{
	font-size:3rem;
	font-weight:700;
text-align:center;
	color:#273E3E;
	margin-bottom:2rem;
}	


/* btn */
.nav_try a,.nav_contact a{color:#ffffff;
	font-size:14px;
	font-weight:700 !important;
	background-color:#34B5B5 !important;
	border:2px solid #34B5B5 !important;
	border-radius:50px;
	display:inline-block;
	height:1em !important;
padding: 1.2em 1.5em !important;
	margin-left:1em;
}
.nav_try a:hover,.nav_contact a:hover{
	color:#ffffff !important;
	background-color:#178B9A !important;
	border-color:#178B9A !important;
}
.nav_contact a{
	color:#34B5B5;
background-color:#ffffff !important;
}
.btn_basic a{
	color:#ffffff !important;
	font-size:14px;
	font-weight:700 !important;
	background-color:#34B5B5 !important;
	border:2px solid #34B5B5 !important;
	border-radius:50px;
padding: 1.4em 3.5em;
}
.btn_basic a:hover{
	background-color:#25A19B !important;
	border:2px solid #25A19B !important;
}

.btn_basic._md a,.btn_border._md a{
	font-size:16px !important;
padding: 1em 2em;
}

.btn_basic._lg a,.btn_border._lg a{
	font-size:18px !important;
padding: 0.9em 2.7em;
}

.btn_border a{
	color:#34B5B5 !important;
	font-size:14px;
	font-weight:700 !important;
	background-color:rgba(255,255,255,0.7) !important;
	border:2px solid #34B5B5 !important;
	border-radius:50px;
padding: 1.4em 3.5em;
}
.btn_border a:hover{
	background-color:rgba(255,255,255,1) !important;
	border:2px solid #25A19B !important;
}
.wp-block-table {    
	
	border:1px solid transparent;
	overflow-x:visible;
}
/* _tab */

.tab_compare .btn_drop{

	display:inline-block;
text-indent:-9999px;

	width:25px;

	overflow:hidden;
}
.tab_compare .btn_drop._open{

}

.tab_compare .btn_drop:hover{

}
.td_more{

}

}

}

}

/* cover */
.cover_index,.cover_startup{
background-repeat: no-repeat;

.cover_index{

/* money */
.item_money{

/* feature */
.feature_tit {

.index_numbers{

/* _price*/
.price_tit h3{

text-align:center;

}	
.price_tit br{
		display:none;

	}

.time_switch{
	color:#616161;
	font-size:16px;
	line-height:1;
	text-align:right;
}
.time_switch._day span{
	text-align:right;
}

.time_switch span{
	text-align:left;

	border:3px solid #ACDDDB;
	border-radius:30px;

}

}
.time_switch i:hover{
	cursor:pointer;
}

// time_switch_2
.time_switch_2_input {
}

.time_switch_2_label {
    cursor: pointer;
    text-indent: -9999px;
    width: 60px;
    height: 30px;
    background: #34B5B5;
    display: block;
    border-radius: 100px;
    position: relative;
}

.time_switch_2_label:after {
    content: '';
    position: absolute;
    top: 5px;
    left: 5px;
    width: 20px;
    height: 20px;
    background: #fff;
    border-radius: 90px;
    transition: 0.3s;
}

.time_switch_2_input:checked + .time_switch_2_label {
    background: #34B5B5;
}

.time_switch_2_input:checked + .time_switch_2_label:after {
    left: calc(100% - 5px);
    transform: translateX(-100%);
}

.time_switch_2_label:active:after {
    width: 20px;
}

    text-align: right !important;
}
	.ast-footer-copyright{
		font-size:11px !important;
		text-align:right;
	}
	
	.ast-builder-html-element,.ast-builder-html-element{
		text-align:left!important;
	}
	
	/* _cover */
	.cover_index,.cover_startup {
    background-size: 120% auto;
    background-position: center 0px;
}
	.cover_tit{
		flex-basis:100% !important;
		order:2;
padding-top:0;
		padding-left:0;
	}
	.cover_tit h2{
		text-align:center;
		font-size:42px;
	}
	.cover_tit br{
		display:inline;
	}
	.cover_tit p{
		text-align:center;
	}
	.cover_tit .wp-block-buttons{
		justify-content:center;
	}
	.cover_vision{
		flex-basis:100% !important;
		order:1;
	}
	.cover_vision figure{
		position:relative;
	}
	
/* _index -------*/
/* _money */
	.money_tit {
		text-align:center;
	}	
.money_tit .wp-block-buttons{
		justify-content:center;
	}
	
	.item_money{
		flex-wrap:wrap !important;
	}
	.item_money > div{
		flex-basis:100%  !important;
	}
	.item_money > div > figure {
		float:none !important;
		text-align:center;
		margin:auto !important;
	}
	.item_money h4,.item_money p{
text-align:center;
		margin-bottom:0.5em;
}
	
	/* _flow */
	.list_flows{
		gap:30px;
	}
	.item_flow{
		min-width:auto;
	}
	
	/* _number */
	.item_number{
		white-space:nowrap;
	}
	.item_number p:nth-of-type(1){
		font-size:40px;
	}
	
	.item_number p:nth-of-type(2){
		font-size:20px;
	}
	
/* _price */
	.list_price{
		gap:30px;
	padding:0 10px;
	}
	.item_price{
		padding:20px 20px 40px 20px;
	}
	
/* try */
	.try{
		flex-wrap:wrap !important;
		text-align:center;
	}
	.try_vision{
		flex-basis:100% !important;
}
	.try_vision figure{
		position:relative;
		width:auto;
	}
	.try_intro{
		flex-basis:100%;
	}
	.try_intro .is-layout-flex{
		justify-content:center !important;
	}
	
/* startup -----*/	
	.list_why{
		gap:40px;
	}
	
}

@media (max-width: 768px){

	.blk_tit h3{
		font-size:2.75rem;
}
	
	/* _price */
	.price_tit br{
		display:inline;
	}
	.list_price{
	flex-wrap:wrap !important;
	}
	.item_price{
		flex-grow:1;
	}
	
	/* _money */
	.list_money{
		flex-wrap:wrap !important;
	}
	.item_money{
		flex-wrap:nowrap !important;
		flex-grow:1;
	}
	.item_money > div{
		flex-grow:1;
	}
	.item_money > div:nth-of-type(1).wp-block-column-is-layout-flow{
		flex-basis:45% !important;
		margin-bottom:0px !important;
	}
	.item_money > div:nth-of-type(2).wp-block-column-is-layout-flow{
		flex-basis:55% !important;
	}
	.item_money > div > figure {
		float:right !important;
		margin:0px !important;
	}
	.item_money h4,.item_money p{
text-align:left;
		margin-bottom:0em;
}
		/* flow */
.list_flows{
	flex-wrap:wrap !important;
	gap:30px;
}
.item_flow{
	min-width:auto;
	flex-grow:1;
}
.flow_intro{
	min-height:auto;
}
	
	/* _identity */
	.index_identity{
	background-size: auto 38%;
}
	.list_identity{
		flex-wrap:wrap !important;
	}
.item_identity{
	max-width:auto;
	flex-basis:100%;
}
	.identity_solgan{
		font-size:1.7rem;}
	
	
	/* _number */
	.index_numbers h3{
	font-size:2.3rem;
		margin-bottom:1.5em;
}
	.index_numbers h3 br{
		display:hidden;
	}
	.list_numbers{
		flex-wrap:wrap !important;
	}
	.item_number{
		flex-basis:25%;
		flex-grow:1;
		white-space:nowrap;
	}	
	.item_number p:nth-of-type(1){
		font-size:36px;
	}
	.item_number p:nth-of-type(2){
		font-size:18px;
	}
	.item_vline:nth-of-type(3n+1){
		display:none;
	}
	
	
	/* startup -----*/	
	.item_why{
		flex-basis:100%;
	}
	
	/* _modules */
.group_modules{
	flex-wrap:wrap !important;
}
	.list_modules{
		flex-basis:100%;
	}
}

@media (max-width: 544px){
/* Structure */
.wrap{
	padding:40px 20px;
}
	
		.page_sub_tit p:nth-of-type(1){
font-size:1.2rem;
}

.page_sub_tit p:nth-of-type(2){
font-size:1.8rem;
}
	
	.blk_tit h3{
		font-size:2.5rem;
}
	
	/* _tab */
.td_project{
	width:7em;
}	
	
	/* footer */
	.footer-social-inner-wrap,.ast-footer-copyright,.ast-builder-html-element,.ast-builder-html-element{
		text-align:center!important;
	}
/* _index */
.cover_tit h2{
		font-size:40px;
	}
	.cover_tit br{
		display:none;
	}
	
	
	/* _feature */ 
	.list_feature{
		gap:20px;
	}
	.item_feature{
	flex-basis:140px;
}
.item_feature figure{
	margin-bottom:1rem;
}
.item_feature h5	{margin-bottom:0.2rem;}
.item_feature p{
	font-size:14px;
	
}	
	
/* _compare */

	.tab_compare th,.tab_compare td{
		padding:1em 0.5em;
}
	
	.tab_compare .td_more{
		width:2em;
	}
	.tab_compare .td_project{
		width:3em;
	}
	
	
/* try */
	.try_vision{
		min-height:auto;
		margin-bottom:0 !important;
}
	.try_intro .btn_basic,.try_intro .btn_border{
		flex-basis:100% ;
	}	
.try_intro .btn_basic a,.try_intro .btn_border a{
		display:block !important;
	}
}

/* 電商教室 */

input[type=search]:focus {
    outline: none;
}

/* 社群開店 */
.elementor-divider-separator {
	border-radius:30px
}
